long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: tofu is where talent teams and hiring managers find pre-vetted, top talent recommended from other company interview processes. Now with our chrome extension, you can easily invite great talent you meet to tofu directly from your ATS with a single click.
